title: Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, Premium Hand Protection from Welder and Cutting Torch Heat, Commercial Quality, Cotton Lined, Gauntlet Cuff, Unisex, Grey, One Size
descriptions:
Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641

Keep your hands safe and comfortable while you work.

Easy to understand benefits:
- Strong protection: These gloves are heavy duty. They help protect you from heat, flames, and common shop chemicals.
- Comfortable inside: Soft cotton fleece lining feels gentle on the skin and helps keep hands cooler.
- Built to last: Made from grade A split cowhide leather with tough Kevlar stitching and fully protected seams, so they stand up to regular use.
- Good grip and movement: A “winged” thumb design makes it easier to hold tools.
- Extra arm coverage: Long gauntlet cuffs (about 13.5 inches) help shield your wrists and lower arms from sparks and splatter.
- Ready for welding: Ideal for MIG and stick welding, and useful for other hot or rough tasks around the workshop.
- One size fits most: Unisex design in gray, sold as one pair.

Why these gloves are a good choice:
- Safe: Heat, flame, and chemical resistant.
- Durable: Lock-stitched seams with Kevlar thread resist wear and tearing.
- Comfortable: Cotton lining feels soft and reduces rubbing.

How to use:
1) Slide on each glove fully so your fingers reach the tips.  
2) Pull the long cuff over your sleeves for extra protection.  
3) Use during welding or any job with sparks or heat.  
4) Let them cool before removing if they feel warm.  

Care tips:
- Brush off dust and metal bits after use.  
- Wipe with a damp cloth if needed; let air-dry completely.  
- Keep away from open flames when not in use.  

What you get:
- One pair of gray, unisex gloves, one size fits most.

If you want strong protection with a soft, comfortable feel, these Lincoln Electric KH641 welding gloves are a simple, reliable choice.
